} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2468) {

server.playerHandler
.yell(“Evil Chicken has been slain by "
+ temp.playerName + " (level-”
+ temp.combatLevel + “)”);
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 795) {

server.playerHandler
.yell(“Ice Queen has been slain by "
+ temp.playerName + " (level-”
+ temp.combatLevel + “)”); [/code]

item.title: Help with npchandler!
item.dc:creator: @masterlop masterlop
item.description:
@masterlop wrote:

When I try to make it where it will say what you killed after you killed it, this happens. When I kill the evil chickens it says i killed the ice queen and when I kill the ice queen, it says nothing. Can someone help? Here is what my npchandler looks like.

[code]server.playerHandler
.yell(“Evil Chicken has been slain by "
+ temp.playerName + " (level-”
+ temp.combatLevel + “)”);
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2468) {

server.playerHandler
.yell(“Ice Queen has been slain by "
+ temp.playerName + " (level-”
+ temp.combatLevel + “)”); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 795) {[/code]

Read full topic
